name: Hugh Manatee (Chel)
description:
Short jank prototype about rescuing manatees. Find them  around the beaches and roll them back into the sea - but avoid rolling them through dangerous trash! A hurt manatee can't go home

May add more levels focused on navigational puzzles/longer form rescues of your manatee friend Hugh.

If you ever find a stranded manatee, do not actually try to push it back into the water. Call your local authorities. Thank you :D
